title: Newton: the mind that found the future
creator_credit: George Kaczender, John Kemeny and International Cinemedia Center
brief_description: Looks at the life of Sir Isaac newton, his contributions to scientific knowledge and the implications of his work for present-day science. Suitable for middle and upper secondary levels.
